'''''esgal''''' is the [[Sindarin]] word for "veil, screen, roof of leaves".<ref>{{S|Elements}}, ''esgal''</ref>

==Etymology==
Possibly [[Old Sindarin|OS]] *''eskala'', [[root]] [[SKAL1]].<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, '''SKAL1'''</ref>

The word is said to be [[Ilkorin]].

==See also==
*''[[Esgalduin]]''
